meanings.sent1: The artist used a delineative style to capture the details of the landscape.
meanings.sent2: Her delineative writing painted a clear picture of the character's emotions.
meanings.sent3: The delineative drawing of the cat made it look like it was dancing.
meanings.sent4: His delineative storytelling brought the ancient legend to life.
meanings.sent5: The delineative map guided us through the forest with ease.

meanings.sent1: The delineative language in the poem vividly described the sunset.
meanings.sent2: The artist's delineative brush strokes added depth to the portrait.
meanings.sent3: The delineative description of the party made everyone want to attend.
meanings.sent4: Her delineative gestures conveyed more than words could express.
meanings.sent5: The delineative details in the report made it easy to understand.
